category.name: Aptitude
category.description: Develop mathematical reasoning and problem-solving skills for competitive exams and interviews.

sub_categories.name: Series
sub_categories.description: Master number series, sequences, and pattern recognition techniques.

exercises.title: Advanced Series Analysis
exercises.description: Analyze complex series and advanced mathematical sequences.

tasks.title: Fourier Series Calculator
tasks.question:
Implement a Fourier series calculator for periodic functions.

Your calculator should:

  • Calculate Fourier coefficients (aₙ, bₙ)
  • Generate Fourier series expansion
  • Handle different periodic functions
  • Calculate partial sums and convergence
  • Visualize series approximation
tasks.hint: Use integration formulas for coefficients, aₙ = (1/π)∫f(x)cos(nx)dx

tasks.title: Fourier Series Properties
tasks.question:
What is the fundamental frequency of a Fourier series with period 2π?

Consider: Relationship between period and fundamental frequency

tasks.title: Zeta Function Calculator
tasks.question:
Create a calculator for the Riemann zeta function.

Your calculator should:

  • Calculate ζ(s) for complex arguments
  • Handle special values (even integers)
  • Implement series representation
  • Calculate critical line values
  • Provide numerical approximation
tasks.hint: Use series definition ζ(s) = Σ(1/n^s), special values for even integers

exercises.title: Complex Series Theory
exercises.description: Work with complex series and advanced mathematical concepts.

tasks.title: Laurent Series Expander
tasks.question:
Implement a Laurent series expansion calculator.

Your calculator should:

  • Expand functions in Laurent series around singularities
  • Identify poles and their orders
  • Calculate principal part and regular part
  • Handle different types of singularities
  • Provide convergence analysis
tasks.hint: Use partial fraction decomposition, identify pole orders, calculate residues

tasks.title: Laurent Series Convergence
tasks.question:
What is the region of convergence for a Laurent series around z₀?

Consider: Annular region between two circles
tasks.hint: Think about the distance from the center of expansion
options: Inside a circle - like Taylor series

tasks.title: Generating Function Calculator
tasks.question:
Create a generating function calculator for sequences.

Your calculator should:

  • Find generating functions for given sequences
  • Extract coefficients from generating functions
  • Handle exponential generating functions
  • Solve recurrence relations
  • Provide closed-form solutions
tasks.hint: Use G(x) = Σaₙxⁿ, manipulate series algebraically
